**A creator is someone who creates social media content or/ and in-person events to fundraise for one of our families in Gaza.** A creator is someone who is excited to make stuff or to post online, and connected to us and to family on social media. By signing up to become a creator with us, you will be committing to taking on one of our family campaigns and committing to consistently amplifying their campaign.
